title: Amazing
text: You can't go to Athens and not visit the acropolis. It is a stunning place both for the incredible temples and the amazing view of the city!

title: Must-do
text: super interesting, very modern museum with some extremely important pieces originally belonging to the Parthenon, plus other troves found in the acropolis. Totally worth the visit, plus for students it is free!

title: amazing introduction to the city
text: this tour was a really nice introduction to the city, we walked at a leisurely pace but still were able to visit a lot of landmarks, the guide, Michael, was super informative and all he told us was very interesting. Totally reccomended!
